channel.title: Need Help With Server
channel.description:
I'll make a list of things i need to do and can any if posible help Thanks...
1. how do i add objects AND make them train skills eg. like making a portal (ob id = 4387) and it to train str how would i do that???
[glow=red,2,300]~NiRvAnA~[/glow]

item.title: Need Help With Server
item.dc:creator: @vraj82192 vraj82192
item.description:
@vraj82192 wrote:

Well you wouldn’t really have to go through the trouble of this, if you already have a source. Then most of them already should have a thing to train all skills (Attack= Dummies, Str= Door , Deff= Hay).

If your using I think its “TestScape” It won’t work, but I don’t have much time to tell you how to do it because Im late for the buss. Ill try to explain it when I get back from school, or Ill try to get on at school.

Good Luck.

(Hint: Go into your client folder and search for the ones arleady made.)

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help With Server
item.dc:creator: @Nirvana.Marijuana Nirvana.Marijuana
item.description:
@Nirvana.Marijuana wrote:

Yeah i just figured it out before you posted and i made the shop

1 more problem how can i make lvl for attack potion different???

[hr][br]

Edit: Omg i just thought i fixed it but i didnt oh well please tell!^^^^^^

Added:

//UnPots and 2nd Ing to Pot else if(itemUsed == 91 && useWith == 221) { if(playerLevel[15] >= 1) { deleteItem(91, getItemSlot(91), 1); deleteItem(221, getItemSlot(221), 1); addItem(121, 1); addSkillXP(25, 15); } else { sendMessage("You need a higher herblore level to make this potion."); } }

I changed the “if(playerLevel[15] >= 1) {” to 1 i compile yet it doesnt change the lvl required please help!

Edit: PROBLEM SOLVERED!!! You gotta use unf finished pot with supply or it doesnt work lmao!

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help With Server

item.description:
@junkyNL wrote:

also place it in the client.java start runserver.bat runserver.bat gives the errors when u did something in player.java , shop. autospawn and much more client.java errors are giving in the compiler

if u want big spaces use tab above caps lock than u do big spaces spacebar gives errors when u start. runserver.bat try tab plz good luck

~johnnyscape~
